EmailTemplate.name: SW: New L5 w/o known SW
EmailTemplate.subject: New L5 w/o a known SW - Please seek a new SW
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
Please see {!Contact.Name}'s account. They are a level 5 w/o a previously known SW. Please seek a new SW for this account.
Click on the link to view the record {!Contact.Link}
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever a level 5 is is shown to not already know a SW.
